Description:
Pokey from Dry Dry Desert and DS Desert Hills.
[[KMP (File Format)#POTI|Route Setting 1]] sets the time in 1/60 seconds to stop at that point. Some of its SFX may be exclusive to certain slots. Requires the bones '''joint1''', '''joint2''', '''joint3''', and '''joint4''' in the [[BRRES (File Format)|BRRES]].
